paragraphs.body: Eric Bauza attended Cardinal Newman High School in Scarborough, Ontario, from 1994 to 1997. Even from a young age, he was a comedic character who was heavily involved with the creative arts.
paragraphs.text: Eric Bauza attended Cardinal Newman High School in Scarborough, Ontario, from 1994 to 1997. Even from a young age, he was a comedic character who was heavily involved with the creative arts.

paragraphs.body: Bauza started his career in animation as a character designer, working with a few production studios in Hollywood. It was this introduction to the animation world that eventually led him to a successful career in voice-overs.
paragraphs.text: Bauza started his career in animation as a character designer, working with a few production studios in Hollywood. It was this introduction to the animation world that eventually led him to a successful career in voice-overs.

paragraphs.body: In just a few short years, Bauza has starred in such Emmy award-winning shows as Nickelodeon's El Tigre: The Adventures of Manny Rivera, The Fairly OddParents, Spike TV's Ren & Stimpy: 'Adult Party Cartoon', Warner Bros. Animation's Coconut Fred's Fruit Salad Island, and Hasbro's G.I. Joe: Resolute. Aside from his television credits, he has played multiple roles on The King and Us, a web-series sponsored by Burger King, and was seen on the NFL on Fox pregame show. Bauza had a cameo role as Digger the NASCAR Gopher in Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakuel.

Bauza had a cameo role as Digger the NASCAR Gopher in Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakuel.

paragraphs.body: He is currently working on his stand up routine and has already performed at the Laugh Factory in Los Angeles alongside Harland Williams.
